name: CreateBCAppNuspec
friendlyName: Business Central - Create NuSpec for App
description: Create nuget NuSpec file for App for Dynamics 365 Business Central
author: Kine

inputs.name: ContainerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the container to use to get info from the app file

inputs.name: ArtifactUrl
inputs.label: Artifact Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifact Url which will be used to get alc.exe and symbols for compiling

inputs.name: AppFile
inputs.label: App file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the App file to be published. Filter could be used. All found files will be published

inputs.name: AppFileExclude
inputs.label: App file Exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the App file to be excluded. Filter could be used.

inputs.name: NuspecFileName
inputs.label: Nuspec File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: File name of the created nuspec file.

inputs.name: Authors
inputs.label: Authors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authors to be used in author part of the nuspec.

inputs.name: Owners
inputs.label: Owners
inputs.helpMarkDown: Owners to be used in owners part of the nuspec.

inputs.name: ReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release notes to be used in the nuspec.

inputs.name: Description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the NuGet package. If empty, Description form the .app file will be used

inputs.name: Copyright
inputs.label: Copyright
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copyrighy to be used in the NuGet package.

inputs.name: Tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags to be used in the NuGet package.

inputs.name: IncludeBaseApp
inputs.label: Include Base Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: If include Microsoft Appplication dependency into dependencies.
